statements: SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678'
SELECT passenger_name, complaint_description FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date = '2022-01-01'
SELECT complaint_id, passenger_name FROM Complaints WHERE passenger_name LIKE 'John%'
SELECT passenger_name FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_description LIKE '%rude%'
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01'
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2021-01-01' ORDER BY passenger_name DESC;
SELECT complaint_id, complaint_description FROM Complaints WHERE LENGTH(passenger_name) > 10;
SELECT complaint_id, passenger_name FROM Complaints ORDER BY complaint_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_description LIKE '%rude%' AND complaint_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(complaint_id) AS total_complaints, MAX(complaint_date) AS latest_complaint_date FROM Complaints;
SELECT * FROM passengers;
SELECT name, feedback FROM passengers WHERE complaint IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM staff WHERE department = 'Customer Service';
SELECT name, department FROM staff ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT staff_id, response FROM staff WHERE staff_id = '99999999-9999-9999-9999-999999999999';
SELECT * FROM passengers WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT name, complaint FROM passengers WHERE feedback IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM staff WHERE department = 'Customer Service' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, department FROM staff WHERE response LIKE '%positive%' AND department LIKE '%Support%' LIMIT 10;
SELECT passenger_id, name FROM passengers WHERE complaint LIKE '%delay%' AND feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints;
SELECT complaint_id, passenger_id, complaint_text, complaint_date FROM complaints WHERE passenger_id = 1;
SELECT passenger_id, passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passengers ORDER BY passenger_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_id, passenger_id, feedback_text, feedback_date FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_id, passenger_name, passenger_phone FROM passengers WHERE passenger_phone IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT complaint_id, passenger_id, complaint_text FROM complaints WHERE complaint_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, passenger_email FROM passengers WHERE passenger_phone LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT passenger_name, feedback_text FROM passengers JOIN feedback ON passengers.passenger_id = feedback.passenger_id;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1;
SELECT passenger_name, complaint_details FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Staff';
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id BETWEEN 2 AND 5;
SELECT complaint_type, COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM complaints GROUP BY complaint_type;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE passenger_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE complaint_id = 1
SELECT complaint_type, passenger_name FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Service'
SELECT * FROM complaints WHERE passenger_name LIKE '%John%' ORDER BY complaint_id DESC
SELECT complaint_type, complaint_details FROM complaints WHERE complaint_type = 'Quality' ORDER BY passenger_name ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_complaints FROM complaints
SELECT * FROM PassengerComplaints;
SELECT complaint_id, passenger_id, complaint_date FROM PassengerComplaints ORDER BY complaint_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Feedback WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM Feedback WHERE feedback_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT passenger_name, email FROM PassengerInfo WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM PassengerComplaints WHERE passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_date FROM Feedback ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM PassengerInfo WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT complaint_text, complaint_date FROM PassengerComplaints WHERE complaint_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';

SELECT resolution_text FROM ComplaintResolution JOIN PassengerComplaints ON ComplaintResolution.complaint_id = PassengerComplaints.complaint_id WHERE PassengerComplaints.passenger_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
